allowFlexTitle.description: Boolean on whether or not multiple titles are allowed

approvalDate.description: Date given that the course was approved for use

attributeName.description: The name of an academic course attribute resource or collection of resources.

attributeType.description: The type or classification of an academic course attribute resource or collection of resources.

attributeValue.description: The value of an academic course attribute resource.

baseTitleCode.description: Is this the base title code

catalogDetail.description: Contains specific details about a course such as its name and description

catalogNumber.description: A number assigned to a course to distinguish it from other courses within the list.  Generally the higher the number the more specialized the course or the course is targeted towards students who are progressing in their degree.

catalogSuffix.description: A code assigned to a course to indicate a feature such as repeatable or designated for honors students.

cipCode.description: A Classification of Instructional Programs (CIP) to provide a taxonomic scheme that supports the accurate tracking and reporting of fields of study and program completions activity.

courseGroup.description: Group of prerequisite courses necessary to be taken before given course can be

courses.description: Groups of prerequisite courses required before the course can be taken. Groups can be alternatives to other groups

creditHours.description: The maximum number of hours a student will be credited with on completion of the course.

creditType.description: Will credit be received for a SEMESTER or TERM

curriculumId.description: Unique identifier of for a curriculum unit.

degree.description: An abbreviation of the degree, i.e. BS for Bachelor of Science.

degreeLevel.description: An indication of rigor required to complete the degree for example a degree of level 7 will take longer to complete than a degree of level 4.

deptName.description: Name of the department course is associated with

diplomaDesc.description: Text to be printed/displayed on a diploma earned with a degree in the associated academic program.

displayOrder.description: The order in which to display the academic program requirement.

edit.description: Individual change made to the curriculum object

edits.description: Changes made to the curriculum object

emphasisReq.description: A flag used to indicate if an academic program requires that a student declare a specific emphasis within the program.

enforced.description: Boolean stating whether or not taking prerequisites before course is required

fall.description: Information about course availability in the fall

fieldChanged.description: An individual field changed for specified curriculum

fieldsChanged.description: A list of fields changed for specified curriculum

fieldName.description: Name of a field that has been changed.

firstBlock.description: Marks whether or not course is active during first block

firstBlockOnDemand.description: Marks whether course can be active during first block if enough students want to take the course

fixedOrVariable.description: Code used to indicate if a course allows variable credits.

frequency.description: Marks the frequency the course is taught for given period

fromValue.description: The value that associated field previously stored.

geAreaName.description: Name of a ge area that is fulfilled by a course

geProgramId.description: Links the general education requirements to an academic program.

gradeRule.description: The grade rule for the course

honorsApproved.description: Has this course been approved as an honors course

honorsRec.description: A flag used to indicate if an academic program provides honor recognition.

instructorApproval.description: Boolean determining whether or not prerequisites taken have to be approved by an instructor

labHours.description: How many lab hours does this course have

lectureHours.description: How many lecture hours does this course have

limEnrProgram.description: Flag used to indicated this academic program is a limited enrollment program and requires acceptance into the program by the academic unit offering the program.

limitationDetail.description: Specifies a limitation for a course and whether or not it is active

limitationType.description: Describes the type of limitation  being applied

limitationValue.description: Boolean on whether or not limitation is active

longDesc.description: A longer textual description of an Academic Program.

example.value: This academic program is designed to ...

majorProgramId.description: Links an undergraduate academic program to a graduate level academic program.

maxProgramHrs.description: The maximum number of hours required to complete the program.

maxRClasses.description: The maximum number of repeatable classes that are allowed (appears to be obsolete or not used).

maxRHours.description: The maximum number of hours that can be accumulated in repeatable courses (appears to be obsolete or not used)

maxYrsCompl.description: The maximum number of years it is expected to take to complete an academic program.

message.description: Explanation of why edit was made.

minCreditHours.description: The minimum number of hours a student will be credited with on completion of the course.  Used in conjunction with variable credit courses to set the minimum credit range.

minGrade.description: Allowable minimum grade that can be accepted in an academic program.

minorReq.description: A flag used to indicate if an academic program requires that a student also complete a minor.

minProgramHrs.description: The minimum number of hours required to complete the program.

onDemand.description: Marks whether this course can be active for period if enough students want to enroll

order.description: Number denoting the position of catalog detail in list

orderInGroup.description: Number denoting the position of prerequisite in prerequisite group required to take the course

prerequisiteCourse.description: Course prerequisite required to be taken before given course

prevProgramId.description: Optionally identifies the academic program of origin.

programHours.description: The number of hours required to complete the program.

programId.description: Internally generated unique identifier of an academic program definition.

programType.description: Code used to indicate what type of program an academic program is.

requirementId.description: Internally generated unique identifier of an academic program requirement resource.

residenceHrs.description: The number of residence hours required to complete the program.

secondBlock.description: Marks whether or not course is active during second block

secondBlockOnDemand.description: Marks whether course can be active during second block if enough students want to take the course

seqNum.description: Sequence number noting the order of the different active periods

semester.description: Is this a semester long course

semesterFrequency.description: Code used to indicate during what semester(s), Fall and Winter, a course is generally offered.

serviceLearning.description: Is this course a service learning course

showFlexTitles.description: Boolean on whether or not to display flex titles

specification.description: An academic program rule specification used to apply a rule to a course.

specificationCategory.description: A classification or grouping of an academic program rule specification.

spring.description: Information about course availability during the spring term

sprSum.description: Information about course availability during the spring and summer terms

summer.description: Information about course availability during the summer term

studyListRequired.description: A flag used to indicate if an academic program requires a study list.

subjectArea.description: An abbreviation of the primary subject content of the course.  Also known as a teaching area or subject code a depricated use has been dept name.

teachingProgram.description: Flag used to indicated that this academic program is associated with a teaching certificate.

term.description: Is this a term length course

textType.description: Describes what type of text will be included in the response

titleCode.description: Unique identifier of a course within a curriculum unit.

transcriptTitle.description: The official title of a course that is printed on the student's transcript.

winter.description: Information about course availability during the winter semester

yearsToComplete.description: The number of years it is expected to take to complete an academic program.
